member.name: T:NationalInstruments.TestStand.TSInterfaces.IAutoPropsPanel
member.summary: Implement IAutoPropsPanel to use .NET module import functionality with TestStand custom step types implemented using the AutoPropsPanel feature.

member.name: M:NationalInstruments.TestStand.TSInterfaces.IAutoPropsPanel.GetAutoPropsPanelStruct
member.summary: Returns a structure defining the settings for a custom step type implemented using AutoProps.
member.returns: A struct defining settings for a custom step type.

member.name: M:NationalInstruments.TestStand.TSInterfaces.IAutoPropsPanel.GetDescription
member.summary: Returns a brief description of this IAutoPropsPanel.

member.name: T:NationalInstruments.TestStand.TSInterfaces.NI_AutoPropsPanelSettingsAttribute
member.summary: Control specific details about AutoProps settings.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.TestStand.TSInterfaces.NI_AutoPropsPanelSettingsAttribute.DisplayName
member.summary: Specify the display name of the setting. The string must be a valid TestStand expression. By default, the variable name is used.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.TestStand.TSInterfaces.NI_AutoPropsPanelSettingsAttribute.Description
member.summary: Specify a description for the setting. The string must be a valid TestStand expression.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.TestStand.TSInterfaces.NI_AutoPropsPanelSettingsAttribute.UseExpression
member.summary:
Specify whether to use an expression for this setting instead of a simple field defined by the type.
Applies only to leaf properties.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.TestStand.TSInterfaces.NI_AutoPropsPanelSettingsAttribute.AllowEmptyExpression
member.summary:
Specify whether to allow empty expressions.
Applies only to leaf properties.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.TestStand.TSInterfaces.NI_AutoPropsPanelSettingsAttribute.ArrayIsResizable
member.summary:
Specify whether to allow resizing of an array property.
Applies only to arrays properties.
